name: Try Not to Puke
description:
Controls/Instructions:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Left click to shoot

Shoot the back balls

Don't let black balls touch you

Overview:

An Top down shooter made in only 3 hours. If you eat something and play this game... You might puke!

Challenges to try:

  • Eat a snack (easy)
  • Eat a meal (hard)
  • Eat the entire fridge(hardcore)

Credits:

Developer/Artist: Lucas Medeiros (DaGameCompany)

Composer:  Leonardo Sobrepeña(Ultimacaligula)

Da Game Company · Try Not to Puke OST
